app.title: CS2 Server Manager
app.subtitle: Upkk CS2 Server Manager & Python v3.14 & FastAPI

home.title: CS2 Server Manager
home.subtitle: Manage multiple Counter-Strike 2 servers with ease through an intuitive web interface
home.deploymentTutorial: Deploy Your First CS2 Server - Tutorial with Images

fastAsync.title: Fast & Async
fastAsync.description: Built on FastAPI with full async/await support for high performance operations

multiServer.title: Multi-Server Management
multiServer.description: Manage multiple CS2 servers from a single interface with SSH connectivity

realTime.title: Real-Time Updates
realTime.description: WebSocket support for live deployment status and server monitoring

secureSSH.title: Secure SSH Access
secureSSH.description: Support for both password and key-based SSH authentication

persistentStorage.title: Persistent Storage
persistentStorage.description: MySQL database for server configurations and Redis for caching

deploymentLogs.title: Deployment Logs
deploymentLogs.description: Complete history of all server operations and deployment activities

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.step1: Navigate to Servers to add your first CS2 server
quickStart.step2: Configure SSH credentials (password or key-based authentication)
quickStart.step3: Deploy CS2 server software with a single click
quickStart.step4: Monitor deployment progress in real-time via WebSocket
quickStart.step5: Manage server lifecycle (start, stop, restart, check status)

profile.title: Personal Center
profile.emailHint: Leave blank to keep current email
profile.apiKeyDescription: Use API keys to authenticate API requests without exposing your password. You can use the API key in the X-API-Key header.
profile.apiKeyWarning: ⚠️ Keep this key secret! Anyone with this key can access your servers.
profile.noApiKey: You haven't generated an API key yet.
profile.confirmRevokeApiKey: Are you sure you want to revoke your API key? This action cannot be undone.

servers.title: Server Management

bulkActions.started: {action} started for {count} server(s). Processing in background...
bulkActions.pluginInstallStarted: Installing {plugins} on {count} server(s). Processing in background...
bulkActions.selectServer: Please select at least one server

sendCommand.title: Send Command to Servers
sendCommand.info: Enter a command to send to all selected game servers. The command will be sent to running servers only.

servers.noServersDescription: Get started by adding your first CS2 server
servers.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this server?

diskSpace.title: Disk Space
diskSpace.note: Usage represents server directory only, not total disk

servers.addNewServer: Add CS2 Server (Ensure New Server Initialization Complete)
servers.gameDirectoryHint: Letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens allowed. Must start and end with letter or number
servers.sshUserHint: Must use cs2server user (from /setup-wizard, default: cs2server)
servers.initializationMessage: If this is a new server, please initialize it first (one initialization per physical server supports multiple CS2 instances)
servers.quickFillDescription: Select from saved server configurations to quickly fill SSH credentials
servers.noSavedServers: No saved server configurations. Please initialize a server in the Setup Wizard and save the configuration first.

serverDetail.title: Server Details
serverDetail.monitoringPriorityInfo: If A2S Monitoring is enabled, it takes priority and Panel Monitoring (SSH process check) will not be used. A2S queries are more lightweight and accurate for detecting server status.
serverDetail.a2sPriorityInfo: A2S monitoring is currently enabled and takes priority. Panel Monitoring (SSH process check) will not be used for status checks.
serverDetail.panelMonitoring: SSH Process Monitoring & Process Guard Configuration
serverDetail.panelMonitoringInfo: Web backend monitors via SSH and auto-restarts if process not found. Independent of local autorestart script.
serverDetail.steamGSLTInfo: ⚠️ Important: GSLT is required if using CS2 Workshop maps. Apply for GSLT from Steam Community, AppID 730
serverDetail.steamGSLTGenerateInfo: Generate with one click if you've set your Steam API key in profile settings
serverDetail.additionalParametersZEDesc: Initial map from Steam Workshop: 3171881962 (example map ID, replace with your desired ZE map)
serverDetail.additionalParametersKZDesc: Initial map from Steam Workshop: 3171881962 (example map ID, replace with your desired KZ map)
serverDetail.a2sServerQuery: A2S Server Query & Process Guard Configuration
serverDetail.enableA2sMonitoringHint: Use A2S queries instead of SSH process checks for server monitoring
serverDetail.a2sQueryHostHint: Leave empty to use server host
serverDetail.a2sQueryPortHint: Leave empty to use game port
serverDetail.a2sCheckIntervalHint: How often to perform A2S queries (15-600 seconds)
serverDetail.a2sFailureThresholdHint: Consecutive A2S query failures before triggering restart (1-10)
serverDetail.a2sConfigInfo: A2S (Address to Server) queries provide real-time server information. Configure custom query address/port if different from server host/game port.
serverDetail.a2sMonitoringNote: A2S monitoring requires Panel Monitoring to be enabled. It provides more accurate server health status than SSH process checks.
serverDetail.a2sVsSshDescription: A2S monitoring detects game server responsiveness via UDP queries (more accurate), while SSH monitoring checks if the process exists (more reliable for system-level issues). A2S is recommended for game-level health checks.
serverDetail.name: Name
serverDetail.a2sQueryFailedDetail: Unable to query server. This could mean the server is offline, A2S queries are blocked, or the host/port is incorrect.
serverDetail.clickQueryNow: Click "Query Now" to fetch server information via A2S protocol
serverDetail.noA2sCheckLogs: No A2S check logs recorded yet
serverDetail.autoUpdateHint: Automatically check and update the server
serverDetail.autoUpdateInfo: When enabled, the server will check for updates at the specified interval
serverDetail.autoUpdateWarning: Auto-update will restart the server when an update is available
serverDetail.updateCheckIntervalHint: How often to check for updates (in hours)
serverDetail.notDeployedMessage: This server has not been deployed yet. Deploy it to install CS2 and start using it.
serverDetail.confirmRedeploy:
This server has already been deployed. Are you sure you want to redeploy?

Redeploying will reinstall CS2 server files.
serverDetail.checkConsoleForDetails: Please check Console & Logs tab to view details
serverDetail.deploymentCommandSent: Deployment command sent to server. Please check the console and logs for progress.
serverDetail.cpuAffinityDescription: Bind the screen process to specific CPU cores to avoid interference. Useful for high-performance servers.
serverDetail.cpuCoresHelp: Select which CPU cores the server process should be bound to. Leave all unchecked to use all available cores.
serverDetail.panelProxyEnabled: Panel Server Proxy: Enabled (All downloads go through this panel server first)
serverDetail.proxyInfo: Choose one: Panel Server Proxy (downloads via this panel) or GitHub URL Proxy (game server downloads via proxy URL). Both modes improve access in restricted networks.
serverDetail.usePanelProxyTooltipServer: All downloads (SteamCMD, GitHub plugins) go through this panel server first, then upload via SFTP. Recommended when this panel can access foreign sites smoothly. Mutually exclusive with GitHub URL Proxy.
serverDetail.panelProxyHintServer: When enabled, all downloads (SteamCMD, GitHub plugins) are first downloaded to this panel server, then uploaded to your game server via SFTP with progress tracking.
serverDetail.githubProxyInfo: Configure a GitHub proxy to accelerate file downloads (for restricted networks like China). Proxy is used for downloads only, API requests use direct connection. Example: https://ghfast.top
serverDetail.githubProxyHelp: Leave empty for direct connection. Enter base URL only (e.g., https://ghfast.top). Note: Proxy accelerates downloads only, not API access
serverDetail.confirmBackupPlugins:
This will backup the following to {path}:

• addons/ folder
• cfg/ folder
• gameinfo.gi file

Do you want to continue?
serverDetail.githubPluginInstallDesc: Install plugins directly from GitHub releases. Supports CS2Fixes, MultiAddonManager, and other CS2 plugins.
serverDetail.usePanelProxyTooltip: Download to panel server first, then upload via SFTP. Recommended when this web panel can access GitHub smoothly but the game server cannot. Note: github_proxy setting is ignored when this is enabled.
serverDetail.usePanelProxyHint: When enabled, files are downloaded to this web panel first, then uploaded to your server via SFTP with progress tracking. The server's github_proxy setting is ignored.
serverDetail.excludeDirectoriesHint: Directories to skip during extraction (e.g., configs you want to keep)
serverDetail.noAddonsDir: No addons/ directory found in archive. This does not appear to be a valid CS2 plugin package.
serverDetail.pluginInstallSuccess: Plugin installed successfully! Restart the server for changes to take effect.
serverDetail.noReleases: No releases found for this repository
serverDetail.noAssets: No downloadable assets in this release
serverDetail.helpDescription: This section provides common troubleshooting guides and fixes for CS2 server issues.
serverDetail.rootLoginRequired: Please log in to your server as root user to perform this operation.
serverDetail.highPrivilegeWarning: Due to requiring high system privileges, the system will not complete this operation for you using the server user account.
serverDetail.kzPluginIssue: On Ubuntu 24.04+ systems, KZ server plugins may fail to load due to missing libssl1.1 library.
serverDetail.followSteps: Follow these steps to fix the plugin loading issue:
serverDetail.step3Description: After installing the package, restart your CS2 server to apply the changes.
serverDetail.manualOperationWarning: These commands must be executed manually on your server. The server manager will not automatically execute these commands for security reasons and due to the need for elevated privileges.
serverDetail.cannotJoinServerTitle: Server Started OK But Cannot Join?
serverDetail.cannotJoinServerDesc: Console shows server started successfully, but you cannot join? Check these common issues step by step.
serverDetail.securityGroupHint: Allow TCP+UDP port 27015 (Source: 0.0.0.0/0 for all IPs)
serverDetail.checkListeningHint: Verify srcds is running on port 27015
serverDetail.confirmPublicIPHint: Make sure you have a public IP address
serverDetail.routerPortForwardHint: Forward TCP+UDP 27015 to your computer's local IP
serverDetail.noPublicIPHint: No public IP? Use FRP/ZeroTier for NAT traversal
serverDetail.case3UDPBlocked: Case 3: UDP Blocked by Datacenter (Common on Cheap VPS)
serverDetail.udpBlockedHint: Test UDP connectivity from your local computer:
serverDetail.ncTestNote: Replace YOUR_SERVER_IP with your actual server IP. Run this on your local machine.
serverDetail.portNoteHint: The examples use port 27015. Replace with your actual game port if different.
serverDetail.deploymentLockMessage: Server may be updating or deploying. If stuck for a long time, you can try clearing the lock and restarting. Usually no action is needed.
serverDetail.confirmClearDeploymentLock:
Are you sure you want to clear the deployment lock?

Only do this if no deployment is actually running.
serverDetail.lowDiskSpaceWarning:
WARNING: Low disk space detected!

Available space: {available} GB
Recommended: {recommended} GB or more

Deploying with low disk space may cause installation failures or server issues.

Do you want to continue anyway?
serverDetail.deploymentLockChinaWarning: If your server is located in mainland China: Servers in mainland China may experience very slow deployment or multiple failures due to poor connectivity with Steam servers. This is not a bug of this program. We recommend being patient and retrying multiple times, or deploying a proxy gateway for acceleration.
serverDetail.workshopMapHint: For workshop maps, set to an official map (e.g., de_dust2), then use additional parameters to set +host_workshop_map WorkshopMapID
serverDetail.aliyunSecurityGroupExample: Aliyun Lightweight Server Security Group Example:
serverDetail.otherCloudProvidersNote: Other cloud providers (Tencent Cloud, Vultr, etc.) have similar settings. Please refer to the example above.
serverDetail.cloudProvidersGeneralNote: Whether it's lightweight servers, Tencent Cloud, Aliyun, Google Cloud, or Amazon Cloud, the principle is similar. This example uses Aliyun for reference.
serverDetail.chinaSteamDownloadWarning: Servers in mainland China may experience very slow Steam server downloads due to international connectivity issues. You may deploy a proxy gateway or other methods for acceleration. This is not an issue with this program - it follows Valve documentation best practices.

pluginFrameworkManagement.description: Install plugin frameworks to enable server modifications and custom plugins.
pluginFrameworkManagement.metamodRequiredNotice: Almost all CS2 plugins depend on Metamod:Source. It is essential for plugin functionality.
pluginFrameworkManagement.cssCardDescription: Write CS2 server plugins in C#. Requires Metamod:Source.

setupWizard.title: New Server Initialization
setupWizard.description: Follow the steps to set up your CS2 server
setupWizard.serverNameHint: A friendly name to identify this server
setupWizard.initializationDescription: The system will complete user creation, environment installation, directory permissions setup, and other basic operations. (Each server only needs to be initialized once)
setupWizard.manualSetupNote: If automatic setup fails, please configure manually
setupWizard.testedEnvironment: Tested Environment: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS with international network access
setupWizard.autoSetupDescription: Just provide SSH credentials, the system handles everything automatically.
setupWizard.autoSetupSupportNote: Supports root or regular user (automatic sudo)
setupWizard.manualSetupDescription: Get setup script and execute manually on server.
setupWizard.manualSetupSuitableFor: Suitable when root password cannot be provided.
setupWizard.autoSetupInfo: Whether you use root or regular user, the system will automatically handle sudo operations.
setupWizard.sshUsernamePlaceholder: root or any user with sudo privileges
setupWizard.sshUsernameHint: Can be root, ubuntu, admin or any user with sudo privileges
setupWizard.sudoDetectionInfo1: If you use root user, no sudo needed
setupWizard.sudoDetectionInfo2: If you use regular user, system will automatically use sudo
setupWizard.sudoDetectionInfo3: System will automatically try to use SSH password as sudo password
setupWizard.sudoDetectionInfo4: If sudo doesn't need password (sudo -i), auto-detect and use
setupWizard.differentSudoPassword: sudo password is different from SSH password (optional)
setupWizard.sudoPasswordPlaceholder: Only fill if sudo password is different
setupWizard.cs2UsernameLabel: CS2 Server Username (Automatically create a dedicated user to run CS2 server with limited permissions, not recommended to change)
setupWizard.setupSuccessMessage: Server environment setup successful! Please use the following credentials to add the server to CS2 Manager.
setupWizard.savePasswordWarning: Please save the above password! It is recommended to save it in a password manager.
setupWizard.manualSetupInfo: Please follow the steps below to execute commands on the target server.
setupWizard.saveServerConfig: Save this server configuration for quick use when adding CS2 servers
setupWizard.openGamePorts: Open UDP Ports 20000~40000 (Game Server Ports, Only Effective When UFW is Enabled)
setupWizard.openGamePortsHint: If UFW firewall is enabled on the server, automatically allow UDP ports 20000~40000 for game servers
setupWizard.savedServersDescription: These servers have been initialized. You can quickly select these configurations when adding a CS2 server.
setupWizard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this server configuration?

common.confirmAction: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

dashboard.title: CS2 Server Manager
dashboard.initialMessage: Enter a server ID and connect to start monitoring...

fileManager.title: File Manager
fileManager.name: Name
fileManager.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this
fileManager.destinationPathHint: Leave empty to extract to current directory
fileManager.statusCheckFailed: Failed to check extraction status. The extraction may still complete in the background.

scheduledTasks.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduledTasks.deleteTaskConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this scheduled task?
scheduledTasks.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

scheduleValueHelp.cron: Format: MIN HOUR DAY MONTH WEEKDAY (e.g., 0 2 * * *)

errors.sshAuthFailedDetail: Please check your server username, password, and port settings.
errors.deploymentInProgress: Server is currently being deployed. Please check the console for progress.

confirmMessages.deleteServer: Are you sure you want to delete server "{serverName}"?
confirmMessages.bulkAction: Are you sure you want to {action} {count} server(s)?
confirmMessages.deleteFile: Are you sure you want to delete this {type}?
confirmMessages.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close?
confirmMessages.installMetamod:
Install Metamod:Source?

(Required for most CS2 plugins)
confirmMessages.installCSS:
Install CounterStrikeSharp?

deploymentTutorial.title: How to Deploy a CS2 Game Server Using This Panel
deploymentTutorial.subtitle: The principles are similar for different cloud providers (Lightweight servers, Tencent Cloud, Aliyun, Google Cloud, Amazon Cloud, etc.). Here we use Aliyun as an example.
deploymentTutorial.chinaSteamWarning: Mainland China servers may experience very slow Steam downloads due to international connectivity issues. You can deploy a proxy gateway or other acceleration methods. This is not a problem with this program. This program follows Valve documentation and best deployment practices.

pluginMarket.title: Plugin Center
pluginMarket.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, author, or description...
pluginMarket.author: Author

addPluginModal.title: Add Plugin
addPluginModal.customInstallPathHelp: For plugins without a standard 'addons' directory, specify where the contents should be extracted (e.g., 'addons' to extract into the addons folder)
addPluginModal.dependenciesHelp: Use the search box above to filter plugins (backend search). Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple. Selected dependencies will be auto-installed when users install this plugin.

installModal.title: Install Plugin
installModal.selectAssetFirst: Please select an asset file first
installModal.versionHelp: Latest version is selected by default
installModal.advancedWarningText: When using selective extraction, the plugin package will be analyzed first. You can then choose which directories or files to exclude from installation. Dependencies will NOT be automatically installed when using this mode.
installModal.exclusionModeHelp: Choose how to select items for exclusion
installModal.selectExclude: Select directories to EXCLUDE from installation:
installModal.selectExcludeDir: Select directories to EXCLUDE from installation:
installModal.selectExcludeFile: Select files to EXCLUDE from installation:
installModal.excludeHelp: Check directories you want to EXCLUDE (useful for preserving configs during updates)
installModal.excludeDirHelp: Check directories you want to EXCLUDE (useful for preserving configs during updates)
installModal.excludeFileHelp: Check files you want to EXCLUDE (useful for preserving specific config files during updates)
installModal.installDependenciesHelp: When unchecked, plugin dependencies will not be installed automatically. This option is automatically disabled when using selective extraction.

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this plugin?
messages.installSuccess: Plugin installed successfully! Restart the server for changes to take effect.
messages.enterGithubUrl: Please enter a GitHub URL first
messages.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields

description.feature1: 1. Plugin Center can add GitHub plugins, supports automatic title and description retrieval, automatic release version identification, no maintenance required
description.feature2: 2. Supports file analysis, extraction ignore directory settings, worry-free plugin upgrades
description.deploymentText: It is strongly recommended to deploy this panel outside of mainland China to avoid GitHub connection issues. If your server is located in mainland China, you can enable "Use Panel Server Proxy" in Server Management - Settings - Download Proxy Settings. When enabled, all downloads (SteamCMD, GitHub plugins) will be downloaded to this panel server first, then uploaded to your game server via SFTP with progress display.

uninstallModal.title: Uninstall Plugin
uninstallModal.selectFilesHelp: Check the files and directories you want to REMOVE. Unchecked items will be kept.
uninstallModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected files? This action cannot be undone.

githubPlugins.analyzeDirectoryHelp: Enter the directory to analyze (default: addons)
githubPlugins.uninstallHelp: This will analyze the plugin archive from GitHub and show files that can be uninstalled. Make sure you have entered a GitHub repository URL and fetched releases in the install section above.

systemSettings.title: System Settings
systemSettings.proxyModeHelp: Choose how servers download resources from GitHub by default
systemSettings.emailFromAddressHelp: Email address that appears in "From" field
systemSettings.gmailApiInfo: Gmail API uses OAuth2 for secure authentication. You need to create a project in Google Cloud Console and download credentials.
systemSettings.gmailCredentialsHelp: Paste the contents of credentials.json from Google Cloud Console
systemSettings.testEmailHelp: Send a test email to verify your email configuration is working

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive password reset instructions
forgotPassword.successMessage: If an account with this email exists, a password reset link has been sent.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password
resetPassword.successMessage: Password reset successfully! Redirecting to login...
